      • getLock

        public Lock getLock(java.lang.String topologyName,
                    IStateManager.LockName lockName)
        Description copied from interface: IStateManager
        Return a lock object backed by the state manager store.
        Specified by:
        getLock in interface IStateManager
        Parameters:
        topologyName - the name of the topology
        lockName - any thread may get the Lock object bound to a given name, but only one thread may obtain the actual lock from that @{code Lock} object.
        Returns:
        an object representing an implementation of a lock.

      • deleteLocks

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> deleteLocks(java.lang.String topologyName)
        Description copied from interface: IStateManager
        Delete all locks for a given topology. Ideally locks should be deleted when released but it's possible that some state systems (e.g., ZooKeeper) will not delete all resources when a lock is released. This method should be invoked to clean all such lock resources.
        Specified by:
        deleteLocks in interface IStateManager
        Returns:
        Boolean - Success or Failure

      • doMain

        protected void doMain(java.lang.String[] args,
                      Config config)
               throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException,
                      java.lang.InstantiationException,
                      java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Returns all information stored in the StateManager. This is a utility method used for debugging while developing. To invoke, run: bazel run heron/statemgrs/src/java:localfs-statemgr-unshaded -- \ <topology-name> [new_instance_distribution] If a new_instance_distribution is provided, the instance distribution will be updated to trigger a scaling event. For example: bazel run heron/statemgrs/src/java:localfs-statemgr-unshaded -- \ ExclamationTopology 1:word:3:0:exclaim1:2:0:exclaim1:1:0
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
